value:
Among all of these Heroes, only one
has earned the title of "Hero-King."
We are all lucky to know him.

Robin wears this attire much like
Marth. Somehow, however, I feel as
if the one he truly resembles is me...

$nMPID_チキ|I hope I get to be a bride one day too.
Like everyone else at the festival!

$nMPID_チキ|Who do you want to marry, Big Tiki?
Whisper it in my ear and I won't tell
anyone! Hehe... You're blushing.

$nMPID_チキ|If you're Big Tiki, then I'm Small Tiki.
And if I sit on your shoulders, we'll
become Extra-Big Double Tiki! Hehe!

Here, I have something for you. Think
of it as a gesture of goodwill from
your friend $Nf.

$nMPID_チキ|I heard whoever gets the bouquet
will win something incredible.
Let's do our best, Big Tiki!

Taking setbacks in stride, persevering
through fear, doubt, and misfortune—
that is why human nature is beautiful.

Everyone is battling it out for the
bouquet. Stay behind me, Tiki.
I won't let you to come to harm.

$nMPID_チキ|I love Big Tiki and all my friends.
I think that means I'll be a happy
bride one day.

I am Tiki, the Voice of the Divine
Dragon. This here is a prior version
of me. We are here for the festival.

$nMPID_双界チキ覚醒|Humans and dragons, like light and
darkness, are forever in conflict.$k$pThe rivalry has ebbed and flowed
over countless years. I have seen
as much with my own eyes...$k$pBut if your drooping eyelids are any
indication, it's probably best we set
aside the lecture for now.$k$pInstead, let me ask you this: when
you first ventured out of the Ice
Dragon Temple...were you afraid?$k$p$nMPID_チキ|No, not really. At least not once I met
Mar-Mar, Caeda, and all their lovely
friends. They were ever so nice!$k$p$nMPID_双界チキ覚醒|I'm glad to hear that. In fact, I think
you'd do well to continue to make as
many human friends as you can.$k$pSpeak with them. Learn everything
about them. Cherish the memories
you make with them forever.$k$p$nMPID_チキ|You're crying, Big Tiki. Are you
thinking of something sad?$k$p$nMPID_双界チキ覚醒|No, I... No. On the contrary, I am filled
with joy for all I've been able
to experience.$k$pI have seen the spirit of dragonkind,
and I have witnessed the heart of
humanity in equal measure.$k$pYou and I have saved our worlds
from shadow and despair—and in
so doing, have made so many friends.$k$pDespite the conflict between dragons
and humanity, we have held dear the
love they have bestowed upon us.$k$pSo, let us stay the course. In time,
I truly believe we will be blessed.
$nMPID_二人|To happiness!
$nMPID_二人|Stand together... Always.
$nMPID_双界チキ覚醒|Ready for your big moment?
$nMPID_チキ|I'm so pleased!
Please don't leave me...
You can do it!
Beautiful, Big Tiki!
"Let's find our happiness!" "Yeah!"
"Am I pretty?" "Indeed you are!"
"Hmm, your dress... There we are." "Oh! Thank you! Does it look nice?"
Where shall we go?
I'll never let go!
Take my hand!

$nMPID_チキ|So I take his hand... And then,
the ring goes on... *giggle*
$nMPID_双界チキ覚醒|Tiki, what are you doing?

$nMPID_チキ|I'm playing weddings!
I'm marrying Mar-Mar.

$nMPID_双界チキ覚醒|Marrying Mar-Mar... Mm...
Well, Tiki, you see... Er...

$nMPID_チキ|Big Tiki, when I grow up, will I be
pretty like you?

'Cause then, maybe Mar-Mar will
marry me. What do you think?

$nMPID_双界チキ覚醒|Wh-what do I think? Well, uh, how
should I put it... It's not that simple.
When you grow up, well...
$nMPID_チキ|Not that simple?

$nMPID_双界チキ覚醒|Oh, don't mind me. Follow your
dream! Here's an idea—let's practice.
$nMPID_チキ|All right. I'll be the groom. So! Tiki!
$nMPID_双界チキ覚醒|Hee hee... Yes?

$nMPID_チキ|Today we have the couple here...
Erm... What do I say... In sickness
and in health!

In good times and bad... We stay
together forever! Do you promise?

$nMPID_双界チキ覚醒| Yes. I vow to stay together with
you forever.
$nMPID_チキ|What a beautiful day! Hee hee!

$nMPID_双界チキ覚醒|That's enough practice, I think!
It's time to meet up with the
others. Ready?
$nMPID_チキ|Yes! Let's go!
